Changes.Change: Added capability to link data from MDT with data from ConfigMgr
Added capability to generate an HTML deployment report
Improved integration of MDT and ConfigMgr data
Moved settings into a seperate window
Fixed code bug that caused the app to open and immediately close on some machines
Fixed the issue where if only one task sequence is active in the environment, it will display as an array of string characters instead of an array of items
Added the capability to change the displayed date/time from the MDT/ConfigMgr default (UTC) to your local system timezone

Fixed an issue where the HTML report returns no results when the dateformat of the default system language of SQL server is not using "mdy" format. Search dates are now passed to SQL server in ISO8601 standard format for compatibility with all SQL dateformats
Fixed the issue where duplicate records might be returned when the computer being deployed already exists in the ConfigMgr database (rebuild scenario)
Restyled the UI with a Modern Metro style
